document_title: Delayed menstruation (late menstruation): Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
The main sign of a missed period is not seeing your period appear on the regular cycle as usual. In addition, depending on the cause of missed menstruation, women may experience different symptoms, including: (4)
Headache;; Pelvic pain; Acne;; Hair loss;; Hirsutism, especially on the face.
